channel.title: Linux Client
channel.description: The link for the Moparscape 3.2 client Linux/Mac version is broken, so if anyone could post a working link for that, or recommend another client that can be run on Linux...I don't have much experience with running Java on Linux, but if it is just 'java className' I think I can get it :P However, shell scripts are much smexier. :P Thanks.

item.title: Linux Client

I updated the link if you didn’t have it already.

item.title: Linux Client
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

The .exe versions are exactly the same except they are packed as a rar executable, so you should still be able to unrar them on linux. Otherwise I will do it myself and reupload the linux version.

Read full topic
